forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun. High near 20C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun. High 67F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy this evening with more clouds for overnight. Low around 15C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low 59F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 24C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening then becoming cloudy with periods of rain after midnight. Low 17C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 18C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High around 65F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall may reach one inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady light rain early...then remaining cloudy with a few showers. Low 14C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional light rain tapering to a few showers late. Low 56F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 68F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Clear during the evening followed by mostly cloudy skies overnight. Low 52F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday

forecastday.fcttext: Sun and a few passing clouds. High near 65F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday

forecastday.title: Sunday
